item.description:
*Jimmy's seems to have changed karaoke to live music for Wednesday...John says they are pretty good...if not we can move on to another location : )....

It's an anything goes type of night - come out and enjoy it with the Newport Friends Group!

Jimmy's Saloon - Pool/Darts/Foosball - Pub Night - Pre-Thanksgiving Fun!

We plan to start a fun night at Jimmy's Saloon at 7PM, November 25, 2009.

Where we end up going after that we never know...

Karaoke usually starts at Jimmy's on Wednesdays at 9PM, but in a separate room than the game room. We can choose to do both.

Food is not available at Jimmy's but they allow us to order take out/take in....
item.how_to_find_us: Meet up at Pool Table area or call 401-829-8516
item.name: Jimmy's Saloon - Pool/Darts/Foosball-Pub Night - Pre-Thanksgiving Fun!
